single_gcode.label: GCode for single extrusion
single_gcode.description: Start GCode to run when doing single extrusion
single_gcode.default_value:
M140 S{material_bed_temperature}; set bed temperature
M190 S{material_bed_temperature}; Stabilize bed
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0, initial_extruder_nr} T{initial_extruder_nr} ; set left or right extruder temperature
M109 T{initial_extruder_nr} ; stabilize left or right extruder temperature
G90
G21
G28; home all axes
G92 X0 Y0 Z0
G1 X20.0 Y20.0 Z1.0 F1000; move heatbed into position
G92 E0 E1; zero extruders
T{initial_extruder_nr}; right tool
M92 E6640; set extruder steps per mm
G92 E0 E1; zero extruders
G1 E25 F250; purge nozzle
G92 E0 E1; zero extruders
G1 Z5.0 F20; move heatbed down a little more
G4 600; wait 600ms
G1 X20.0 Y30.0 Z0 F9000; move to tack down the strands
G4 600; wait 600ms
G1 Z5.0 F9000;move up a bit
G4 300; wait 300ms
G1 X152.5 Y152.5 F9000;fast move to center
M117 Printing...;Print Job Start
M1001;Raise3D Start Code

dual_gcode.label: GCode for dual extrusion
dual_gcode.description: Start GCode to run when doing dual extrusion
dual_gcode.default_value:
M140 S{material_bed_temperature}; set bed temperature
M190 S{material_bed_temperature}; Stabilize bed
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0, 0} T0
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0, 1} T1
M109 T0 ; stabilize left or right extruder temperature
M109 T1 ; stabilize left or right extruder temperature
G90
G21
G28; home all axes
G92 X0 Y0 Z0
G1 X20.0 Y20.0 Z1.0 F1000; move heatbed into position
G92 E0 E1; zero extruders
T0; right tool
M92 E6640; set extruder steps per mm
T1; left tool
M92 E6640; set extruder steps per mm
T0; left tool
G92 E0 E1
G1 E25 F250; purge nozzle
T1; right tool
G92 E0 E1
G1 E25 F250; purge nozzle
G92 E0 E1; zero extruders
G1 Z5.0 F20; move heatbed down a little more
G4 600; wait 600ms
G1 X20.0 Y30.0 Z0 F9000; move to tack down the strands
G4 600; wait 600ms
G1 Z5.0 F9000;move up a bit
G4 300; wait 300ms
G1 X152.5 Y152.5 F9000;fast move to center
T{initial_extruder_nr};switch to first extruder
M117 Printing...;Print Job Start
M1001;Raise3D Start Code

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M107
M1002
M104 S0 T1
M104 S0 T0
M140 S0
M117 Print Complete.
G28 X0 Y0
G91
G1 Z10
G90
M84
